comments.body: Ah, good catch, thanks! Since you're there, would you mind also fixing the relative path in the very last item? After that we'd be good to go.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +1,5 @@### Pull Request Checklist

- [ ] Read and understand the [contribution guidelines](https://github.com/digital-asset/daml/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md)
- [ ] Include appropriate tests
- [ ] Set a descriptive title and thorough description
